content: Seasoned pros say WHAT!!!
Interesting. We should chat some time.
Interesting as can be. Thanks for sharing.
I've never wondered that, but that's a rad perspective!
It's nice to meet you! And welcome to the groupware gossip community!
Interesting... Very interesting.
Wow, how interesting.
I agree, back end is a very cool topic, but I also really like front end. Have you explored much front end development yet?
I've got a few questions that I think you will find interesting.
I've literally never wondered that because I already know!
I'm already in development. So, what do I do now?
Great stuff! I can't wait for you to post about part 2!
This still doesn't answer my question. What should I do?
Part 2 is just as great as part 1! Nicely explained.
Interesting. I like this post a lot.
I also took my first programming class in Middle School, but I only recently decided to make it my career.
I don't want to learn because I already know! Lol!
Teach me your interesting coding tips, please.
Nicely done. I'm excited to see what you produce moving forward!
High quality post right here. Watch out everybody! We got a super dev here!
